articles.description: The Dyson Supersonic r is a tube-shaped hair dryer that dwarfs its predecessor, and it's surprisingly light.
articles.content: Dyson's signature Supersonic hair dryer hasn't changed much since its launch back in 2016, so the brand caught us by surprise when it unveiled a brand new model with a completely different look at Ne… [+2261 chars]
